item.title: How to Easily Host a Static website on Github
item.description: This post shows, how you can easily host your static website on Github. We are using Hugo static site generator. You can use anything similar. Initial Setup I believe that you already have setup your hugo project, refer the link in case you want to start a project. Then open your config.toml file and modify the baseUrl as: baseurl = "http://{username}.github.io/" replace {username} with your username. Repository for Project Files This step is not mandatory, but still you want to do this.
